e="preserve">Lino Esterino Garavaglia (9 September 1927 – 12 June 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was made a priest in 1954. From the 1980s to the 2000s he was the bishop of the dioceses of Tivoli and Cesena-Sarsina. He was born in Milan.
On 4 October 1945, Garavaglia joined the Order of Friars Minor Capuchin. On 5 December 1954, he was ordained as a priest in the Milan Cathedral.
On 12 June 2020, Garavaglia died in a nursing home in Cesena, Italy, at the age of 92.
